resources.string: This is a project design as entry into ALC 2.0. visit www.andela.com for more details.
BitCoin is the most popular digital currency which was created in 2009. Bitcoin uses blockchain technology, a peer to peer electronic cash system that enables online Bitcoin payments.
Launched in 2015, Ethereum is a distributed public blockchain network. Ether is also used by application developers to pay for transaction fees and services on the Ethereum network
This app show a list of top 20 world currencies equivalent cryptocurrencies of the BitCoin and Ethereum
